name: examwoi-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Examwoi Hybrid LMS (Backend API & Frontend Admin)

scripts.start:frontend: cross-env REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL=$REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL REACT_APP_APP_URL=$REACT_APP_APP_URL REACT_APP_API_KEY=$REACT_APP_API_KEY npm start -w frontend
scripts.dev:frontend: cross-env REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL=$REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL REACT_APP_APP_URL=$REACT_APP_APP_URL REACT_APP_API_KEY=$REACT_APP_API_KEY npm run dev -w frontend
scripts.prisma:full: npm run prisma:install && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:seed -w api
